formatName: Auto FX PhotoGraphic Edges Image File
formatDescription: The image file used by the now discontinued Auto FX PhotoGraphic Edges, a program used for enhancing digital images with effects. The files are raster images which could be overlaid onto another image to apply the effect.
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration
